Crime.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Crime.description: A gripping crime thriller featuring investigative journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander.
Crime.author: Stieg Larsson

Crime.name: Gone Girl
Crime.description: A psychological thriller that explores the secrets and lies within a marriage.
Crime.author: Gillian Flynn

Fantasy.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Fantasy.description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, following the magical journey of a young wizard.
Fantasy.author: J.K. Rowling

Fantasy.name: The Name of the Wind
Fantasy.description: An epic fantasy novel chronicling the life of Kvothe, a gifted young man with a mysterious past.
Fantasy.author: Patrick Rothfuss

Sci-Fi.name: Dune
Sci-Fi.description: A science fiction masterpiece set in a distant future where noble houses vie for control of the desert planet Arrakis.
Sci-Fi.author: Frank Herbert

Sci-Fi.name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Sci-Fi.description: A humorous science fiction series following the misadventures of Arthur Dent, an ordinary human plucked from Earth.
Sci-Fi.author: Douglas Adams

Adventures.name: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
Adventures.description: A classic adventure novel depicting the escapades of young Tom Sawyer in a small town on the Mississippi River.
Adventures.author: Mark Twain

Adventures.name: Treasure Island
Adventures.description: A tale of pirates, treasure maps, and adventure on the high seas.
Adventures.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Thriller.name: The Da Vinci Code
Thriller.description: A mystery thriller involving a symbologist and a cryptologist solving a murder in the Louvre Museum.
Thriller.author: Dan Brown

Horror.name: It
Horror.description: A terrifying horror novel about a group of friends confronting their worst nightmares when they return to their hometown.
Horror.author: Stephen King

Horror.name: The Shining
Horror.description: A chilling tale of supernatural terror as a family becomes caretakers of an isolated hotel during the winter.
Horror.author: Stephen King

Historical Fiction.name: The Book Thief
Historical Fiction.description: Set in Nazi Germany, this novel tells the story of a young girl who steals books and shares them with others, all while Death narrates her story.
Historical Fiction.author: Markus Zusak

Historical Fiction.name: The Nightingale
Historical Fiction.description: A historical fiction novel set in France during World War II, focusing on two sisters and their struggle to survive and resist the Nazi occupation.
Historical Fiction.author: Kristin Hannah

Biography.name: Steve Jobs
Biography.description: A biography of Steve Jobs, the co-founder of Apple Inc., detailing his life, career, and impact on technology.
Biography.author: Walter Isaacson

Biography.name: Becoming
Biography.description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, reflecting on her life, her journey, and her role as a public figure.
Biography.author: Michelle Obama

History.name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
History.description: A thought-provoking exploration of the history of Homo sapiens, from the emergence of our species to the present day.
History.author: Yuval Noah Harari

History.name: The Guns of August
History.description: A detailed account of the first month of World War I, analyzing the events leading up to the conflict and its consequences.
History.author: Barbara W. Tuchman

Art Book.name: The Art Book
Art Book.description: An illustrated encyclopedia of artists and their works, spanning centuries and cultures, offering a comprehensive overview of the world of art.
Art Book.author: Phaidon Editors

Art Book.name: Ways of Seeing
Art Book.description: A seminal work on visual culture and art theory, challenging traditional ways of looking at and understanding art.
Art Book.author: John Berger
